injectors.label: Add Area Rug
injectors.promptFragment: Include an appropriately sized area rug that anchors the furniture arrangement and complements the design style.

injectors.label: Add Curtains
injectors.promptFragment: Add elegant floor-length curtains to the windows that complement the room's color palette and style.

injectors.label: Add Indoor Plants
injectors.promptFragment: Include tasteful indoor plants - a mix of sizes from small potted plants to larger floor plants where appropriate.

injectors.label: Add Wall Art
injectors.promptFragment: Add tasteful wall art that complements the room's style - properly scaled and positioned artwork or photography.

injectors.label: Minimal Staging
injectors.promptFragment: Use minimal furniture - only essential pieces. Keep the space feeling open and uncluttered.

injectors.label: Luxury Staging
injectors.promptFragment: Use high-end, luxury furniture and finishes. Include premium materials like marble, brass, and rich textiles.

injectors.label: Family-Friendly
injectors.promptFragment: Stage with family-friendly furniture - durable fabrics, rounded edges, and a warm, inviting feel suitable for families with children.

injectors.label: Add Accent Lighting
injectors.promptFragment: Include table lamps and floor lamps to create warm, layered lighting throughout the space.

injectors.label: Add Throws & Cushions
injectors.promptFragment: Add cozy throws and decorative cushions to sofas and beds for a lived-in, inviting feel.

injectors.label: Neutral Color Palette
injectors.promptFragment: Use a neutral color palette - whites, creams, grays, and natural wood tones. Avoid bold or bright colors.

injectors.label: Warm Color Palette
injectors.promptFragment: Use warm colors - terracotta, rust, warm browns, and golden tones throughout the staging.

injectors.label: Cool Color Palette
injectors.promptFragment: Use cool colors - blues, greens, and cool grays throughout the staging.
